file_content.text: The shuttle is waiting at the shuttle bay.
Did Alilia and the boy arrive safely?
Then you did send them?
I wasn't sure what to think when these two showed up.
Think, "now we have the key to reclaiming Hoth's airspace."
This is the pirates' cloaker.
I said the Republic would take care of them, and I don't like being made a liar.
I hope you treated them well.
I saved a life, did my job and maybe won the war for the Republic. A little respect, please.
Watch your tone.
I told him about Trick's connection to the Force, but I don't think he was listening.
It's just how she's dressed. I--I was listening. I understand the boy has... injuries, which impair the use of his talents.
He should be sent to the Jedi at once. If it's possible to heal him without damaging his powers, he can be in no better hands.
Come with me, son.
No! Don't take him!
The Jedi will treat him well. I hear they even have their own lullabies.
Relax. It'll be alright.
They're very close. Give her a moment.
Gently, Lieutenant.
The Republic's in charge now.
Back off, Alilia.
Just... let me tell him what's going on.
Go on, Trick. They're going to find a way to make things all better.
Thank you for saving us. I... I didn't think people really got second chances, at least not people like us.
I should go now. Trick and I are on the next ship to Tython. I don't... suppose you want to come along?
We run in the same circles now. Keep an eye out for me.
[Flirt] I can't, but....
I don't make that kind of promise, sweetheart.
I don't like to be tied down.
Then I'll just have to watch out my window every night, in case your ship is landing....
That's just so sweet I may vomit.
Actually, we usually land at spaceports that aren't visible from major settlements... oh. Sorry.
Don't hold your breath.
What a pathetic waste of time.
You changed my life, Captain. I won't forget you.
To be with you? Frankly, I can't imagine you've got much more to offer.
What would be the point?
You... why you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking... wampa bait! I should have let Shai Tenna kill you!
You know, you're not the first woman who's thought that. Maybe we should start a club....
Do you like it when they call you that?
You should not have shamed her.
Ha!
Aaarrrgh!
I won't let them mistreat him. If they're cruel to him, I'm going to get him out. I swear.
It's not like the Jedi are going to train him on this ice cube. This is your ticket to somewhere warm.
You're getting off Hoth.
You make a good case.
The Republic will take care of you.
You'll be safe here.
You've seen me mad. Believe me, you don't want to see me really mad.
Don't even think about it.
No, I just... thank you. Whatever they do, it's got to be better than Shai Tenna.
Thank you for everything.
Ah, thank you for coming.
So, according to Major Panin's files, you were attempting to acquire the White Maw's cloaking technology?
Do you have anything to report?
The pirates still have it, but I doubt they'll use it against the Republic again.
They got away with it.
The pirates just have a member with a unique talent for the Force.
There is no cloaking device.
That's... disconcerting. I'll request a Jedi advisor immediately.
By the time I got to it, there was nothing left to bring back.
[Lie] It was destroyed.
Hmm. I will certainly mention that to the Senator.
I see Major Panin had already suggested a dedicated military unit as a better choice than... freelancers.
So, if you have no other business here, have a speedy journey. Hoth is no place for civilians.
Captain, Lieutenant Kollis here.
We, ah, met earlier. That business with the ship-to-ship sensors?
I spoke to Senator Dodonna and verified your assignment, but there's a few things to clear up before you leave.
Send the Senator a bill for any damages....
The Senator will pay for it.
It's all right. That's all been settled.
What's up?
I'd rather talk in person.
I don't have to talk to you.
Don't worry. The Senator's office has covered the cost of the droids you shot.
I'm taking over Major Panin's duties, and I want to clear up his records.
Just drop by his office before you head off-planet, all right?
Can't you think of a better way to express your gratitude?
[Flirt] Say "thank you."
Maybe I can....
Excuse us....
As I recall, I'm still waiting for our first chance.
[Flirt] Second chances?
Oh!
Do you really want to avoid spending time alone with me?
[Flirt] Let's be together.
Go on, Trick. Mama will be along later.
Did you get the boy?
Did you think I maybe left him in a wampa cave?
I brought him, Captain, but I don't think the lieutenant took me seriously.
He is here.
Don't worry, Captain. There were no higher bidders.
So, it's the truth? That child has something to do with the White Maw's cloaking technology?
Well, yes, some ruffian brought him here.
So he was telling the truth about the child's part in the White Maw's cloaking technology?
He can use the Force to get you past the Empire's defenses.
He's the key to taking Hoth.
The Force! He can't even speak, how can he control the Force?
This is... not my field. I'll send for a new Jedi advisor.
Senator Dodonna wanted to know how the White Maw got past our defenses. He's it.
I did my job.
Not really an explanation. However, I won't interfere in a Senator's business.
If I was going to lie, I'd come up with something a bit more plausible.
Are you calling me a liar?
That wouldn't be difficult. Very well, I'll let the Senator figure out what to do.
I'll keep the child here until her office sends for him.
Now about the damages to those droids... never mind. You look eager to be on your way....
